$SOL  is acting like it wants to move, but there is one level that keeps shutting the door on us.
Every time we get close to 125, the sellers just dump it back down. You can see that big red candle from yesterday where it got rejected hard. Right now, we're just hovering around 122.87, basically in no man's land.
The volume isn't really there to push us through the 125 resistance yet. I'm watching that 120 level closely; if we lose that, things could get ugly pretty fast and we might retest 119 again.
I'm staying flat for now. I'd rather wait for a clean break above 125 or a bounce off the bottom before putting money on the table.

#SOL
üî• Update: $SOL   ETFs have recorded consistent net inflows for 3 straight weeks, a sign of growing institutional interest despite the broader market cooling off.   Ôªø#SOL  #Altcoin Season#

$SOL has already completed a sharp pullback from higher levels and is now stabilizing above a well-defined demand zone. Sellers pushed price down but failed to extend the move, showing selling pressure is weakening.
Instead of continuation selling, price is forming a tight range near support. This type of structure often leads to a relief move toward nearby resistance once momentum builds. As long as SOL holds above 120, upside continuation remains possible.

Support Zones:
‚Ä¢ 123.0 ‚Äì 120.8 (intraday demand)
‚Ä¢ 118.5 ‚Äì 116.8 (major structure support)
Resistance Zones:
‚Ä¢ 126.5 ‚Äì 128.0 (local supply)
‚Ä¢ 138.0 ‚Äì 145.0 (major recovery zone)

My son asked for $1k on Solana for Christmas

I said no

‚ÄúSon, Solana doesn't do any horizontal scaling, & everyone pays the same fees for the same speed"

I got him another gift instead - $1k on a fresh Avalanche Core Wallet.

He opened it with visible disgust

Then something utterly shocking happened

My wife‚Äôs boyfriend Alf got my son the Solana account he wanted

‚ÄúThank you uncle Alf‚Äù my son hugged him for almost a minute

I pulled my wife aside and explained that her lover is undermining our values of tokenizing the world with millions of appchains.

She mumbled ‚Äúat least he got him a real gift‚Äù

The morning after, while my son was still asleep, I took his Solana account & immediately full ported in a fartcoin derivative.

Thanks to the wonderful performance of FARTINU69, I was able to withdraw $7,527 in profit

Then I bought a gift for my son that he truly deserves

635 AVAX in his Avalanche Core Wallet so he can demonstrate max Avalanche alignment 

When I came home my son was crying looking for his balance on Solana

I smiled and showed him his AVAX on Avalanche

He started shaking and cried even more

Being a good parent means teaching your child Avalanche-aligned values

‚Ä¶.my wife and her boyfriend are furious. 

Am I the asshole here?

$SOL   (Solana) ‚Äî Market Structure Overview  Solana reached a new all-time high at 295.83 this year, before breaking below the 2023 close / 2024 open (101.72) and the 2025 low at 95.26.  The downside over the last three months has stabilized near the 62% Fibonacci retracement of the Dec 2021 low ‚Äì Jan 2025 high range (monthly chart), coinciding with the center of the March‚ÄìApril 2025 order block zone.  Scenario: If price confirms above 146, a move toward 185.86 (50% Fibonacci of the last downswing) is possible. From there, price is expected to consolidate within the range between the 2022 and 2025 opens, or extend slightly higher toward the 38% Fibonacci level at 201, forming a classical head and shoulders pattern, before a reversal and renewed decline below the 2024 open. #SOL  #Solana
